009
010package Ch07_Morphological_Filters;
011
012import ij.IJ;
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.ImageStack;
015import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
020import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryThinning;
021import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
022
023import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
024
025/**
026 * <p>
027 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates morphological thinning on binary images. See Sec. 7.2 of [1] for additional details.
028 * This plugin works on 8-bit grayscale images only, the original image is modified. Optionally, the plugin creates a
029 * stack of images obtained from each thinning iteration. The maximum number of thinning iterations can be specified.
030 * Zero-value pixels are considered background, all other pixels are foreground. Different to ImageJ's built-in
031 * morphological operators, this implementation does not incorporate the current display lookup-table (LUT).
032 * </p>
033 * <p>
034 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
035 * (2022).
036 * </p>
037 *
038 * @author WB
039 * @version 2022/12/07
040 */
041public class Thinning_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
042
043        private static boolean ShowStackAnimation = true;
044        private static boolean ShowIterationCount = false;
045
046        private int maxIterations;
047        private ImagePlus im;
048
049        /** Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open. */
050        public Thinning_Demo() {
051                if (noCurrentImage()) {
052                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.RhinoSmallInv);
053                }
054        }
055
056        @Override
057        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
058                this.im = im;
059                return DOES_8G;
060        }
061
062        @Override
063        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
064                maxIterations = Math.max(ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight());
065                
066                if (!runDialog()) {
067                        return;
068                }
069
070                BinaryThinning thin = new BinaryThinning(maxIterations);
071                ByteProcessor bp = (ByteProcessor) ip;
072
073                if (ShowStackAnimation) {
074                        ImageStack stack = new ImageStack();
075                        stack.addSlice("initial", ip.duplicate());
076                        int deletions;
077                        do {
078                                deletions = thin.thinOnce(bp);
079                                if (deletions > 0) {
080                                        stack.addSlice(deletions + " deletions", ip.duplicate());
081                                }
082                        }
083                        while (deletions > 0 && thin.getIterations() < maxIterations);
084                        new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle() + "-thinning", stack).show();
085                }
086                else {
087                        thin.applyTo((ByteProcessor) ip);
088                }
089
090                if  (ShowIterationCount) {
091                        IJ.log("Iterations performed: " + thin.getIterations());
092                }
093        }
094        
095        private boolean runDialog() {
096                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
097                if (im.isInvertedLut()) {
098                        gd.setInsets(0, 0, 0);
099                        gd.addMessage("NOTE: Image has inverted LUT (0 = white)!");
100                }
101                gd.addNumericField("max. iterations", maxIterations, 0);
102                gd.addCheckbox("Show stack animation", ShowStackAnimation);
103                gd.addCheckbox("Show actual iteration count", ShowIterationCount);
104
105                gd.showDialog();
106                if (gd.wasCanceled())
107                        return false;
108                
109                maxIterations = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
110                ShowStackAnimation = gd.getNextBoolean();
111                ShowIterationCount = gd.getNextBoolean();
112                return true;
113        }
114        
115}
116
